Category:Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire audio drama voice actors

nodes.text: Gary Groomes voiced Xexus Shev and the Emperor Palpatine in the audio drama version of Crimson Empire.
Groomes also worked in the audio adaptation of the Dark Forces saga, voicing Governor Dol Donar II and Major Horst in Soldier for the Empire, Gorc in Rebel Agent and Major Vig in Jedi Knight.
